DOC.brief_summary: The Örebro prevention program brief ( 6 x 30 minute ) program administer parent 13-16 year old youth regular parental meeting . The program aim encourage parent maintain restrictive attitude towards youth drink throughout child 's teenage year , thereby postpone reduce youth drinking . A previous quasi-experimental study program developer show sustain alcohol-specific restrictivity among parent expose program , also reduction drinking measure among youth expose parent ( Koutakis , Stattin & Kerr , 2008 ) . This study aim investigate whether effect sustain also program go wide dissemination Sweden .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Örebro Prevention Program Youth Drinking
DOC.criteria: Municipal school county local ÖPP program presenter , comprise grade 79 , least two 7th grade class parallel , previous experience Örebro prevention program .
